column3: Tourism;Siem Reap: The working report on the Angkor Department of Tourism’s Development of the Apsara Authority in August 2018 indicates that the rescue team responded to 19 cases of injuries caused by slippage or stumbling
column7: and food poisoning. ------These issues arise because some guests are negligent and do not comply with instructions or personal health issues.------There were 31 cases of lost property
column11: and camcorders which were found and returned to the owner.------All these activities have received great thanks and admiration from international and local tourists.------http://www.rasmeinews.com/%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%97%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%93%E1%9E%B6%E1%9E%80%E1%9F%8B%E1%9E%84%E1%9E%B6%E1%9E%9A%E1%9E%91%E1%9F%81%E1%9E%9F%E1%9E%85%E1%9E%9A%E1%9E%8E%E1%9F%8D%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%93%E1%9F%83%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%A2/------ ------
